text: A Fazenda 10, also known as A Fazenda 10: Mais Conectada, stylized A Fazenda 10: + Conectada (English: The Farm 10: More Connected) is the tenth season of the Brazilian reality television series A Fazenda, which premiered Tuesday, September 18, 2018, at 10:45 p.m. on RecordTV. Marcos Mion replaced Roberto Justus as the main host, while season 9 winner Flávia Viana makes her debut as the show's new special correspondent, replacing Sheila Mello. ==Contestants== Biographical information according to Record official series site, plus footnoted additions. bgcolor=D1E8EF | Runner-Up | 2nd |- | Rafael Ilha | 43 | Singer | Rio de Janeiro | bgcolor=B22222 | | bgcolor=73FB76 | Winner | 1st |- |} ==Future appearances== After this season, in 2019, Cátia Paganote appeared in Dancing Brasil 5, she placed 6th in the competition. ==The game== ===Fire challenge=== This season, contestants compete in the Fire challenge to win the Lamp power. The Lamp power entitles the holder the two flames (red and blue) which may unleash good or bad consequences on the nomination process, with the red flame power defined by the public through of R7.com among two options. The winner chooses a flame for himself and delegates which contestant holds the other. Then, Léo was chosen by her to hold the red flame in which he should nullify four votes cast (Aloísio, Cátia, Felipe and Fernanda's votes). * : Vida, as the second nominee, had to choose the third nominee among the contestants in the stall. Léo was chosen. * : Due to the Fire Challenge, Caíque won an immunity only for the contestant's votes. He could be, however, nominated by the Farmer of the Week. * : Nadja, as the second nominee, had to choose the third nominee among the contestants in the stall. Felipe was chosen. * : Due to the Fire Challenge, the votes given by the contestants (except for the Farmer of the Week) were nullified. Then the second nominee was decided by a dynamic. Cátia, as the Red Flame's holder, started the dynamic by saving a contestant to be nominated. She saved Aloísio, who saved Luane, who saved Léo, who saved Perlla, who saved Caíque, who saved Fernanda, who saved Rafael, leaving Ana Paula as the second nominee. * : Rafael, as the Blue Flame's holder, had to decide the third nominee among the members of the stall this week (Evandro, Gabi and João). Rafael chose Evandro. * : Rafael, as the second nominee, had to choose the third nominee among the contestants in the stall (Caíque, Felipe, Fernanda and Luane). He chose Luane. * : Due to the Fire Challenge, Felipe was immune from the Farmer of the Week's nomination. * : As the second nominee, Nadja had to choose the third nominee among the contestants in the stall (Aloísio, Caíque and Fernanda). She chose Aloísio. * : Due to the Fire Challenge, Caíque had to nominate two contestants: one from each team. * : Evandro had to choose the third nominee from the contestants in the stall (Cátia, Léo and Nadja). He chose Cátia. * : Nadja was ejected from the competition after attacking Caíque. * : Cátia was ejected from the competition after attacking Evandro. Due to her ejection, the planned eviction was cancelled. == Ratings and reception == ===Brazilian ratings=== All numbers are in points and provided by Kantar Ibope Media. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%; width: 100%" ! rowspan=2 width="05.0%" | Week ! rowspan=2 width="12.5%" | First air date ! rowspan=2 width="12.5%" | Last air date ! rowspan=2 width="12.5%" | Timeslot (BRT) ! colspan=7 width="35.0%" | Daily SP viewers (in points) ! rowspan=2 width="10.0%" | SP viewers (in points) ! rowspan=2 width="10.0%" | BR viewers (in points) ! rowspan=2 width="05.0%" | Ref. |- ! width="05%" | Mon ! width="05%" | Tue ! width="05%" | Wed ! width="05%" | Thu ! width="05%" | Fri ! width="05%" | Sat ! width="05%" | Sun |- | 1 | | | rowspan=4| Everyday 10:45 p.m. | — | 9.8 | 10.5 | 10.0 | 9.4 | 6.6 | 7.8 | 9.0 | 7.4 | |- | 2 | September 24, 2018 | September 30, 2018 | 8.6 | 7.3 | 7.7 | 8.1 | 8.7 | 7.2 | 7.3 | 7.8 | | |- | 3 | October 1, 2018 | October 7, 2018 | 7.3 | 9.3 | 10.6 | 9.3 | | | | | | |- | 4 | October 8, 2018 | October 14, 2018 | | | | | | | | | | |- |} * In 2018, each point represents 248.647 households in 15 market cities in Brazil (71.855 households in São Paulo) ==References== ==External links== * A Fazenda 10 on R7.com Category:2018 Brazilian television seasons Category:A Fazenda
